wikipedia_page.main:
Edith Hume (1843–1906) was a British painter and illustrator.

She was born Edith Dunn and married the painter Thomas O. Hume. She was active in the Netherlands during the years 1878–1906, creating beach scenes of Dutch fisher folk in Katwijk and Scheveningen as a follower of the Hague School.Edith's brother, Henry Treffry Dunn, was a studio assistant to Dante Gabriel Rossetti.
